title: You shouldnt be able to play ranked until you meet the following criteria
body:
At least 3 rune pages which have been completed with tier 3 runes

my last jungler had the following on 1 of his rune pages.. the other was completely empty.

by buying a rune page you become **Invested** in your account

he had the following:

PAGE 1

x6 hybrid pen marks
x1 armor mark
x1 ability power mark

x6 armor seals
x1 mana regen seal
x1 attack speed seal
x1 scaling health seal

x6 magic resist glyphs
x2 mana glyphs
x1 cdr glyphs

Quints

x1 health
x1 AD
the other slot was empty


PAGE 2
was empty.


when asked about his rune choices and offer advise i was told to STFU! 


Really unfair

replies.body:
3 rune pages? 2 should be enough. A generic AP as well as a generic AD one does suffice.
Just because his rune page was all over the place and not at all meta doesnt mean that he would have sucked with it, he is probably used to playing like that.
I can agree that there should be much harsher restrictions, playing ranked should be a privilege not just something you can do.
